title: S.O.B.
lastfmSummary: Rateliff has said the song is about drinking one's life away after a break-up, and that the lyrics are based on his personal experience with delirium tremens during alcohol withdrawal. He also described it as a "joke song" and said that originally his band didn't plan to record it, but due to positive reception, did so and released it as a single. The music video was released on July 15, 2015. It was directed and edited by Greg Barnes, and produced by Melissa Giles. Read more on Last.fm.
